Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class that implements all methods and declare all attributes regarding the model of a player
Since:
2020/06/28
See Also:

    • hasPlacedWorkers

      public boolean hasPlacedWorkers()
      Method used to check if current player has placed his workers on the board (getter of hasPlacedWorkers)
      Returns:
      hasPlacedWorkers boolean value (true = has placed | falce = hasn't placed)

      Parameters:

      public void setConstraint​(Card constraint)
      Method used to set a single constraint to the current player
      Parameters:

      Method used to remove a single constraint to the current player
      Parameters:

      Method used to get the current worker

      Method used to get the unmoved worker
      Returns:
      unmovedWorker Worker that isn't moved in the current turn

    • getWorkerFromString

      public Worker getWorkerFromString​(java.lang.String worker)
      Method used to get the worker from the list of workers of the current player, using a string
      Parameters:
      worker - String that represents the worker to get
      Returns:
      worker Worker in the list of workers corresponding to the worker name contained in the string passed to this method

    • selectCurrentWorker

      public boolean selectCurrentWorker​(GameMap gameMap, java.lang.String worker)
      Method used to select the current worker on the current game map
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Current game map of the current game
      worker - String corresponding to the current worker's name
      Returns:
      boolean value corresponding to the possibility to select the current worker on the game map (true = it is selected | false = it isn't selected)

    • checkIfCanMove

      public boolean checkIfCanMove​(GameMap gameMap, Worker worker)
      Method used to check if a worker can move in the current game map
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current game
      worker - String representing the name of the worker to check
      Returns:
      boolean value (true = worker can move | false = worker cannot move)

    • checkConstraint

      private boolean checkConstraint​(GameMap gameMap, Worker worker, Card card, java.util.List<Directions> direction)
      Method used to check if one of the constraint assigned to the current player is a move constraint. In the case, this method delete squares in which the worker cannot move from the list of available squares. This method can check one constraint every method's call
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current game
      worker - Worker to move
      card - Card containing the constraint to check
      direction - List of directions in which worker can move
      Returns:
      boolean value (true = there is at least one available square | false = it cannot move into any square)

    • checkIfLoose

      public boolean checkIfLoose​(GameMap gameMap)
      Method used to check if the current player lose, checking if both workers cannot move
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current player
      Returns:
      boolean value representing the losing status of the player (true = has lost | false = hans't lost)

    • getFirstAction

      public Response getFirstAction()
      Method used to get the first action of the current player, according to the power assigned to him
      Returns:
      firstAction Response enumeration value

    • findWorkerMove

      public java.util.List<Directions> findWorkerMove​(GameMap gameMap, Worker worker)
      Method used to get the list of directions in which a worker can move
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current game
      worker - Worker to find the possible directions
      Returns:
      directions List of directions in which the worker can move

    • executeWorkerMove

      public Response executeWorkerMove​(GameMap gameMap, Directions direction)
      Method used to move the selected worker of the current player
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current game
      direction - Direction in which move the worker
      Returns:
      movedStatus Response represents the execute move status

    • findPossibleBuild

      public java.util.List<Directions> findPossibleBuild​(GameMap gameMap, Worker worker)
      Method used to get the list of direction in which a worker can build
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current game
      worker - Worker that will build
      Returns:
      directions List of directions in which the worker can build

    • executeBuild

      public Response executeBuild​(GameMap gameMap, Building building, Directions direction)
      Method used to build in a selected direction
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current game
      building - Type of Building to build
      direction - Direction in which build
      Returns:
      buildStatus Response represents the execute build status

    • checkVictory

      public Response checkVictory​(GameMap gameMap)
      Method used to check the victory status of the current player
      Parameters:
      gameMap - Game map of the current game
      Returns:
      victoryStatus Response represents the victory status of the current player

    • assignConstraint

      public void assignConstraint​(java.util.List<Player> playerList)
      Method used to assign a constraint to a list of player
      Parameters:
